node.speaker: Jina Anne, Nathan Curtis & more...
node.title: Talks from DSCONF 2018
node.description: The DSConf was a 2-day conference in Finland dedicated to Design Systems. Some of the keynote speakers include Nathan Curtis, Hayley Hughes and the IBM team, Karri Saarinen from Airbnb and more.

node.speaker: Stephen Hathaway
node.title: Designers Git-It - A Unified Design System Workflow
node.description: Stephen talks about the process in his company where designers are using Git to automate and enhance their Sketch workflow and collaboration.

node.speaker: Theresa Ma & Taron Ghazaryan
node.title: The Yelp Design System -  Impact at Scale
node.description: The design systems team at Yelp talk about what it's like to build a design system and use it to impact at scale.

node.speaker: John Riviello
node.title: Polymer-Powered Design Systems
node.description: In this talk you'll learn the specifics of working with Polymer, the most popular Web Components library, to build your design system in a way that can be used across any web-enabled device.

node.speaker: Cristobal Castilla & Zack Schiller
node.title: Design Systems & Tools at Facebook
node.description: Facebook designers show how their teams collaborate. They also show a demo of internally developed tools that help them design faster and more consistenly at scale.

node.speaker: Paul Farino
node.title: Design Systems - Zero to One
node.description: Paul Farino discusses the lifecycle and iterative nature of building a design system. He’ll cover creating buy-in with internal stakeholders and tactical ways to scale and maintain a design system.

node.speaker: Karri Saarinen
node.title: Scaling Design with Systems
node.description: Airbnb designer Karri Saarinen gives a talk during Nordic Design 2017 about how to scale design by using and leveraging systems.

node.speaker: Benjamin Wilkins
node.title: Thinking in Symbols for Universal Design
node.description: Benjamin Wilkins, Design Technologist at Airbnb touches on the internationalization and localization of design elements, and how might we design with consistency for multiple interface targets.

node.speaker: Diana Mounter
node.title: Introducing Design Systems Into Chaos
node.description: Diana Mounter, Design Systems Lead at GitHub shares practical examples on setting up a design system, what to prioritize, and how to make a big impact to customers and colleagues.

node.speaker: Nate Baldwin & Alan Wilson
node.title: Systemizing Design
node.description: We will tell the story of Design Systems and the basics of what to know to get one started at your organization, including real-life examples of the challenges and evolution of building a design system from inside Adobe.
